doc:
Colin Jeavons https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colin_Jeavons 0 Colin Abel Jeavons (born 20 October 1929) is a retired English television actor. He was born in Newport, Monmouthshire, to parents from the English Black Country, and the family moved to West Bromwich before Jeavons' first birthday. He grew up in the town's Stanway Road. He married the ballet dancer Rosie Jeavons in 1965. Colin_Abel_Jeavons ( born_20_October_1929 ) is a_retired_English_television_actor . He was_born in Newport , Monmouthshire , to parents from the_English_Black_Country , and the_family moved to West_Bromwich before Jeavons '_first_birthday . He grew up in the_town 's_Stanway_Road . He married the_ballet_dancer_Rosie_Jeavons in 1965 .
